comments.comment:
Sri Lankan passport is one of the worst passport .. I am happy that I have the German passport! Sri Lankan government has never taken any action to sign visa waiver agreement with other countries . 

According to my scrutiny ,
The Government Of Sri Lanka, ONLY signgs visa waiver agreement for DIPLOMATIC AND OFFICIAL PASSPORTS.....

The passports of Sri Lanka look very cheap, it's unable keep up with European, American even with some Asian countries passports. It is embarrassing to travel with Sri Lankan passport !
comments.author: Pierre Vadivel
